description: Porn legend and sex educator Nina Hartley provides an introduction to Polyamory and healthy non-monogamy. If you've ever considered taking multiple partners or sharing your partner with others in a consensual but less-than-casual way, this 2-hour lecture makes an excellent guide. Learn what Polyamory is and how to tell if it's the right lifestyle for you and your partner. Nina and her host, Danarama, discuss the different styles of polyamory, how it's different from swinging, open relationships, and other similar sounding practices. You'll learn the advantages and risks that come with polyamory, including how to prevent and deal with jealousy issues. Plus, you'll hear successful tips for communication, negotiating boundaries, and trying polyamory in your own life.
title: Introduction to Polyamory: Spreading the Love
